data.title: The Women of BAD BOY to speak at Beauty Chronicles
data.meta_description: FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE  CONTACT: PROLIFIC MUSIC GROUP ProlificMusicGroupInc@gmail.com The Women of BAD BOY to speak at Beauty Chronicles A Women’s Empowerment Brunch series and Panel Conversati…
data.text:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE

CONTACT:

PROLIFIC MUSIC GROUP

ProlificMusicGroupInc@gmail.com

The Women of BAD BOY to speak at Beauty Chronicles

A Women’s Empowerment Brunch series and Panel Conversation

Hollywood, CA (August 1, 2016) –– The Women of the upcoming Bad Boy Family Reunion Tour (Including Faith Evans, Laurieann Gibson & TOTAL) are scheduled to speak at the first installment of the Beauty Chronicles Empowerment series during several tour stops of the forthcoming BAD BOY family reunion tour ‪beginning August 25th.‬

Powered by ORS Olive Oil, the panel will focus on elements of sisterhood, images of beauty, self-esteem, stereotypes and more, all while offering tips on living one’s truth and presenting one’s authentic self on their personal journey to becoming beautiful, both inside and out.

The Panel Brunch Series will travel to seven cities including Chicago, Detroit, Baltimore, New York, Atlanta, Philadelphia, and Los Angeles. Confirmed participants include GRAMMY Award winning, multi-platinum selling artist Faith Evans, World-Renowned choreographer Laurieann Gibson (Lady Gaga, Nicki Minaj, Diddy) and multi-platinum selling girl group TOTAL, alongside several surprise special guests!

The event will start with a networking mixer powered by ORS Olive Oil where refreshments will be served followed by a panel discussion.

Sponsorship opportunities for this event are available! If interested, please contact Steven Jones of Brand Maverick Entertainment at Steve@BrandMaverickEnt.com

About Beauty Chronicles

Beauty Chronicles is a movement designed to inspire women to be and love their most authentic selves, through shared experiences about the journey to becoming beautiful, both inside and out. Attendees at each event across the country will hear from a celebrity guest panel for intimate and revealing conversation on sisterhood, images of beauty, self-esteem, stereotypes and more, all while receiving tips on learning to love and be your most authentic self.

About ORS Olive Oil

We exist to enhance her life, style, personal beauty and potential. We make healthy, beautiful hair possible for the multi-cultural consumer regardless of hair type or texture. ORS is the trusted source for healthy, versatile, beautiful hair.

About Faith Evans

Faith Renée Evans is a multi-platinum Grammy Award winning recording artist, songwriter, arranger and record producer. Faith is also a New York Times best-selling author, an entrepreneur, a TV executive producer and most importantly — a mother. With so many hats to be worn, it is undeniable that Faith has a little something for everyone. Through what has been an equally rewarding and trying career, ask her how she’s come this far and she’ll simply reply, “FAITH.”

About Laurieann Gibson

LAURIEANN GIBSON (Creative Director/ Choreographer/Artist) is a force to be reckoned with, an artist in her own right. Having worked with top names including Katy Perry, Lady Gaga, Diddy, Akon, K-pop’s Big Bang, and Nicki Minaj, Gibson’s unique brand of blending traditional artist development with movement and dance training, has made her one of the most sought-after creative directors and choreographers working in the music industry today.

About TOTAL

Total is a multi-platinum selling R&B group discovered by Sean “Puffy” Combs, who signed the ladies as the first ever girl group to Bad Boy Records. Total released their debut single “Can’t You See,” ft. The Notorious B.I.G., reaching #2 on Billboard’s R&B Chart. Their self-titled debut followed shortly after, spawning hits “No One Else,” “Kissin’ You,” and “Do You Think About Us,” pushing sales to over 1 million as certified by the RIAA.

About Prolific Music Group

Led by managing partner Cheryl Briggs (a 20-plus year music veteran and entrepreneur; Bad Boy, Showtime At The Apollo, SONY, LaFace) Prolific Music Group is an independent music label and production house, releasing three GRAMMY nominated albums for international recording artist Faith Evans.

About Brand Maverick Entertainment

Brand Maverick Entertainment (BME) is a boutique brand management firm led by 10-year industry professional and brand strategist Steve Jones. BME specializes in positioning their clientele’s product within world’s view through tailor made, scalable solutions.

Areas of focus include digital marketing, endorsement deals, product development, TV, Film and more.
